title: New: Seoul – The Line
body:
It feels like Montreal outfit **Seoul** have been around for years, and what’s made the wait for new material worse, has been the constant insider rumours of material kicking around behind the scenes.

Only their third single, _The Line_ also comes with a confirmed release date at the start of June for their debut LP. More upbeat than anything they’ve put out in the past, it’s still as melancholic and painfully wistful, floating and disappearing as quickly as it arrived. Check it out below.

Only their third single, The Line also comes with a confirmed release date at the start of June for their debut LP. \[…\]
